artist: After Francesco Raibolini Francia; Giuseppe Guizzardi; Giuseppe Rosaspina
description: Virgin and Child at center on a throne with a musician angel at their feet; to the left Saints  John the Baptist, Monica, and Augustine; to the right kneeling donor and Saints Sebastian, Francis, and Proculus
